alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued June 24 at 2:18AM MDT until June 24 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong crosswinds may create increased blow off and blow over risks for light weight and high profile vehicles. Those towing camper trailers and light load semi trucks are particularly at risk.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County
